ROM.Changelog:
Changelog: All Nitrogen-Project Changes + My Changes: Fix Offline Charging. Fix Enable low-power-mode on boot.(maybe the cause for dead batteries) Fix 60fps bug in Youtube

Recents: -Add Membar to recents

Notifications: -Ticker(Disable HeadsUp to use ticker)
Settings: Display: -Extended Desktop -Ambient Display

Full Substratum Support
